I was a fan of Eminem, not anymore. What was true about anything he said? That Trump will start a nuclear holocaust? I didn’t agree with anything he said, and I stopped listening after the first minute. Half of the country is full of Republicans, that means half of his fans are out. If people want to reunite this country, expressing their views like this isn’t going to do anything except divide. Some celebrities just need to not say anything, because he just lost a ton of respect from half of his fan base. America voted Trump in, and that means that is America’s choice. All Eminem did was make himself look like a full blown retard, I think that ugly beard is speaking for him
It was the worst thing I've heard in my life. It makes me want to vote for trump all over again.

It was half truth, I didn't vote for trump (Im third party) so I dont really have a dog in this fight. I'm just thinking that I kinda lost some respect for Eminem. I figured that he was a lefty, so I'm not surprised by anything he said but telling your fans "fuck you" over political ideologies? That's just childish for anyone at any level.
